text: Dee Vance Benson (August 25, 1948 â€“ November 30, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was born in Sandy, Utah. He was nominated to the United States District Court for the District of Utah in 1991 by President George H. W. Bush. From 1999 to 2006, he was chief justice of the court. Benson died of brain cancer on November 30, 2020 at his home in Salt Lake City, Utah at the age of 72.U.S. District Judge Dee Benson dies at age 72 ==References== ==Other websites== * BYU Law Review * Crandall Canyon Mine - Deseret News * Mineral Leasing Act * Secretary of the Interior Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Lawyers from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Dee Benson
